product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin, pH Balancing Daily Face Wash, Oil Free and Soap Free, 13.52 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
I want to like it so much...
body: I am very acne prone with oily skin, and I was hoping this would help without harsh acids or peroxides that are in acne-specific treatments.  I have been using this wash for about a month, and while it does have its benefits, I have only broken out in more acne than ever.  I will continue to use in hopes that my skin is simply adjusting. I will update my review to five stars if my skin clears up.Pros: good value. Very little is needed to wash face, and a lot is included in bottle. This will last a long time.I use it in conjunction with the effaclar mat lotion, and both together have really helped the oil build up on my skin. My skin feels fresh and clean after using this.Cons: my skin literally seems to hate this, even though I myself want to like it so much. More acne than ever. Ow. :(

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin, pH Balancing Daily Face Wash, Oil Free and Soap Free, 13.52 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Pump RUSTS!!!??!!!?
body: The liquid product itself is great. However, the metal within the pump apparently rusts and produces a nasty brown sludge as you can see if you look on the pictures I posted (just look under the edge of the screw on cap in the pics). If you reach out to customer service, they will tell you that the pump should not be stored where it can get moist, otherwise it will rust. But this is a liquid product that I imagine most people use in their bathrooms, so I do not see how you could store the pump dry unless you take it apart, cap the bottle with something else, and store the pump head in a dessicated container. This would be akin to selling a bath towel that you tell the customer can't get wet!!  I have other products with pumps with metal components--this is the only one that rusts!

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin, pH Balancing Daily Face Wash, Oil Free and Soap Free, 13.52 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Dried out my lips but not my face.
body: I'm sad. Since I started using this my lips have been EXTREMELY dry but my face is still just as oily. If only I could wash my face without my lips getting wet at all lol But even then its been a couple weeks and I'm seeing no improvement to oily skin.

product: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: La Roche-Posay Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel Cleanser for Oily Skin, pH Balancing Daily Face Wash, Oil Free and Soap Free, 13.52 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
title:
2.0 out of 5 stars
Different formula with fragrance; caused dry spots
body: Not sure what happened as I‚Äôm a long term user of this face wash and have purchased both on Amazon and in store at target among others, but this newest shipment had a noticeable new scent to it when there wasn‚Äôt a scent before. My skin reacts badly to scented products, but I still tried this new formula and broke out all over my chin and had dry patches on the corners of my mouth from it. If this is a new formula and not just a fake, I do not recommend.
